data.water_temp_12: # Hours of pump ON for Water 10°C < temp < 12°C, clear for default,
data.water_temp_16: # Hours of pump ON for Water 12°C < temp < 16°C, clear for default
data.water_temp_24: # Hours of pump ON for Water 16°C < temp < 24°C, clear for default
data.water_temp_27: # Hours of pump ON for Water 24°C < temp < 27°C, clear for default, DEFAULT IF NO TEMP
data.water_temp_30: # Hours of pump ON for Water 27°C < temp < 30°C, clear for default
data.water_temp_99: # Hours of pump ON for Water temp > 30°C, clear for default
